name: 陳正中
objective:
本課程的主要目的在學習智慧營運管理的基本觀念與應用。課程內容包括：(1) 智慧營運管理基本概念、(2) 大數據分析與營運管理、(3) 人工智慧與營運管理、(4) 物聯網與營運管理、(5) 智慧製造與營運管理、(6) 智慧物流管理、(7) 智慧供應鏈管理、(8) 智慧生產規劃與排程、(9) 永續營運管理。
This course will introduce basic concept and application of advanced operation management. The topics addressed in this course include: (1) Basic concept and application of intelligent operations management, (2) Big data analytic and operations management, (3) Artificial intelligence and operations management, (4) IoT and operations management, (5) Smart manufacturing and operations management, (6) Intelligent logistic management, (7) Intelligent supply chain management, (8) Intelligent production planning and scheduling, (9) Sustainable operations management.
